/////////////////////////////////////////////////
Auth UI demo Cloud Firestore Demo Real-time database demo Storage Image Demo
Demonstrates the Firebase Auth UI flow, with customization options. Demonstrates using a FirestoreRecyclerAdapter to load data from Cloud Firestore into a RecyclerView for a basic chat app. Demonstrates using a FirebaseRecyclerAdapter to load data from Firebase Database into a RecyclerView for a basic chat app. Demonstrates displaying an image from Cloud Storage using Glide.
